Title: Rabbit-Proof Fence
Actors: Everlyn Sampi, Tianna Sansbury, Laura Monaghan, David Gulpilil
Plot: In 1931, three half-white, half-Aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their houses to be trained as domestic staff, and set off on a journey across the Outback.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 23 wins & 24 nominations.
Production: Olsen Levy Productions, Australian Film Finance Corporation, Showtime Australia, Rumbalara Films
